answers.answer: Hi i read your post and Merry Christmas to you and your family.. First off the great news is that your tests all came out fine....the second is that it sounds like you have a great doctor that is very proactive with your treatment plan....third is that from everything you've posted the doc has no doubt hit it on the head.  I am unsure if you are aware of it but Medhelp has a wonderful Anxiety site and in reading a couple of the posts i see where more than a few members of that community are going thru the same thing as you are ...you may want to re post on that site to try to join in on that support group because its super active....good luck to you and happy holidays.

question: Im 34 y.o. M i weigh 250lbs im 5"'6 hispanic currently ive been diagnosed with hypertension and have been having chest pain mostly sharp muscular from that i became anxious and was diagnosed with anxiety i also have PVC's not that many sometimes i do feel them pretty bad i take bystolic 10mg and norvasc5mg at noon daily latelyive been feel a little tightness on my chest which usually starts as back pain i got checked out by my cardio he said all was clear but i dont believe him what if he made a mistake. I must add that my last lab work came out great no diabetes no cholesterol trigklycerides were great way low echo came out clear stress test was passed ekg was normal sinus with pvc sonogram was fine no signs of ischemia or heart attack with all of this i should be fine but why do i get chest painand anxiety can the chest tightness just be anxiety i dont know what to do any more please help
title: anxiety
